programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Sniper Jacob Broadsky takes out a victim who escaped from the justice system; Booth uses his military training to try to stop Broadsky before he strikes again; Angela's father visits the Jeffersonian.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: During a blizzard that causes a citywide blackout, the team must solve a murder case that could be connected to a possible viral outbreak; Sweets starts a touchy conversation about Brennan and Booth's relationship.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan teams up with a forensic podiatrist to match seven pairs of severed feet with bodies; Cam makes college plans for her daughter.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A TV-show host's remains are found in the wilderness; Vincent Nigel-Murray makes surprising confessions while making amends with each member of the team.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When the remains of a maritime museum security guard are found in the Florida Everglades, Booth asks a former Iraqi soldier for help with the case.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The remains of a successful ad man are found in a new community center playground; the members of the team try to communicate more honestly.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.sub-title: Royalty + Marriage + Vivaah Sanskar + Zinc + Henna
programme.desc: Mac, Desi and Russ go under cover during a royal Indian wedding to protect a princess whose policies could put her life in danger; Bozer suspects Riley is up to her old hacking ways.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.sub-title: Barn Find + Engine Oil + La Punzonatura + Lab Rats + Tachometer
programme.desc: Mac and the team delve into the world of Italian car culture to track down a crime boss; Mac must lean on Desi when he discovers that he's losing the ability to control his hands; Mac and Desi move in together.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.sub-title: H2O + Orthophosphates + Mission City + Corrosion + Origins
programme.desc: Mac and Desi travel with Bozer to his childhood home when his aunt dies in a tragic accident; they soon discover she may have been murdered for trying to expose the city's contaminated water supply.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and Riley go missing and wake up 24 hours later in a cornfield with no memory of how they got there; they must unravel the mystery and find out how to get rid of the nanotrackers in their bodies, no matter the cost.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Special agents for the Department of External Services, Angus "Mac" MacGyver and Jack Dalton, work to recover a missing bioweapon.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: MacGyver and the team attempt to rescue Jack's former CIA partner who went missing in Venezuela after finding evidence to take down an international arms dealer.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: In Malaysia, MacGyver and the team extract a terrorist group's money man who has intel on an impending attack, but when the man is shot, MacGyver must keep him alive in order to learn the terrorists' plans.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and Jack work with a Russian bomb programmer and his alienated handler to defuse a Soviet-era warhead in Moscow; when the antiquated computer breaks down, Mac must find a way to fix it.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Oni Kalalea Ke Ku a Ka La'au Loa
programme.desc: Danny tells Charlie a bedtime story about a case involving bad Santas and a holiday miracle.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: When an FBI agent who was cracking down on organized crime is killed, McGarrett rounds up every gang-related criminal on the island to find the culprit responsible for the murder.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: O Ka Mea Ua Hala, Ua Hala Ia.
programme.desc: Grover must prevent a man who is accused of killing his wife from committing suicide.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: The corpse of a diamond smuggler is stolen from a graveyard; Five-0 tracks down his partner, who is determined to retrieve their latest batch of contraband; Adam recruits a new, confidential informant; Tani gets a devastating call.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: McGarrett and Danny investigate the murder of a private detective whose client was killed the same way; Adam sends Jessie into a dangerous situation with disastrous consequences; Danny's uncle comes to town to help with the restaurant.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: O Na Hoku O Ka Lani Wale No Kai 'Ike I Kahi O Pae
programme.desc: Tani and Junior go under cover as prospective parents to infiltrate a private school where the headmaster was murdered; Adam's life is on the line when he is held captive and forced to produce a massive amount of money.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Holapu Ke Ahi, Koe Iho Ka Lehu
programme.desc: Adam's mission to take down organized crime goes sideways when the bait he uses falls into the wrong hands; Adam begins to doubt Jessie's allegiance.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: The ex-wife of the man who shot Danny reveals how Danny helped save her life; Tani and Junior are assigned to walk the beat as uniformed officers for the day; Adam is framed for the murder of the crime boss he has been tracking.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Aohe Mea Make I Ka Hewa; Make No I Ka Mihi Ole
programme.desc: A hit man McGarrett's father failed to arrest comes to McGarrett to finally confess his crimes and admit where he buried his victims; Jessie makes a dangerous decision that could ruin Adam's life.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: He Lokomaika'i Ka Manu O Kaiona
programme.desc: Catherine Rollins recruits McGarrett and Jerry to help track down uranium thought to be hidden on an abandoned Hawaiian island before a terrorist makes dirty bombs with it; Junior gets trapped in a ravine.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Harry Langford enlists McGarrett and Danny's help to track down a teenage British royal who has run away while under his protection; Grover, Tani and Junior work a 25-year-old murder case after a mysterious videotape arrives at headquarters.
